summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Judicial Nominating Commission of Dallas will convene on April 25, 2024, at 6:00 PM. The meeting will take place via videoconference and in-person at City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, TX 75201. The primary purpose of this meeting is to interview candidates for full-time Municipal Judge positions, including the Administrative Judge and Associate Judge roles.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from the previous meeting on April 16, 2024.
2. Executive session to interview candidates for the Municipal Judge positions.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include a closed executive session pursuant to Section 551.074 of the Texas Open Meetings Act, allowing the commission to deliberate on the appointment and employment of the judges. This session is critical as it involves the selection of key judicial positions within the city.

**Action Items**:  
The commission will seek approval for the minutes from the previous meeting and will make decisions regarding the appointment of candidates for the Municipal Judge positions. The outcome of the interviews will guide the commission's recommendations for these judicial roles. 

Participants are reminded of the handgun prohibition notices applicable to the meeting venue, ensuring compliance with local regulations.
